to build a research facility over a 10-year span at Hanscom Air Force Base in Bedford, Mass. (Boston Globe)

Fenway Park itself isn't likely to change much in the 40 to 45 years officials said it has left, but the experience of visiting Fenway Park will continue to evolve.

Health & Wellness

CDC: 2011 was worst measles
year in US in 15 years

There were 222 cases of measles reported. Most of the cases were imported -- either by visiting foreigners or by US residents who picked up the virus overseas.

US helicopter crashes in Afghanistan with 4 US troops

A US defense official said an American military Black Hawk helicopter has crashed in southwestern Afghanistan with four US troops aboard. There was no word on casualties.
